item.title: Hunger stones: the practice of marking river levels with carved stones during droughts, to warn future generations that there will be a famine if the water level gets low enough to see the carving. This has been done since 1115 and as recently as 2018 https://t.co/tsMw8JRgJN https://t.co/HYvIO7WiBU
